translation.to: Errorcode %errcode% received from mDNS engine; connection cannot continue.
An error occured while trying to establish a connection to %username% for chat.
Connection to Bonjour has failed: the Bonjour service was not found on this system. Click here to download it.

translation.from: Communicate with no-hassle, serverless, always-on messaging to other users inside your local area network.
translation.to: Communicate with no-hassle, serverless, always-on messaging to other users inside your local area network.

translation.from: Enter your desired Bonjour username and click connect.
translation.to: Enter your desired Bonjour username and click connect.
